title: cannot import name 'ugettext_lazy' from 'django.utils.translation'
body:
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

How to reproduce the problem
---------
xh@x156:~$ doccano init 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/doccano", line 8, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/dist-packages/backend/cli.py", line 176, in main
    django.setup()
  File "/home/xh/.local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/django/__init__.py", line 24, in setup
    apps.populate(settings.INSTALLED_APPS)
  File "/home/xh/.local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/django/apps/registry.py", line 91, in populate
    app_config = AppConfig.create(entry)
  File "/home/xh/.local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/django/apps/config.py", line 123, in create
    mod = import_module(mod_path)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.10/importlib/__init__.py", line 126, in import_module
    return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level)
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 1050, in _gcd_import
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 1027, in _find_and_load
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 1006, in _find_and_load_unlocked
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 688, in _load_unlocked
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>", line 883, in exec_module
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 241, in _call_with_frames_removed
  File "/home/xh/.local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/allauth/account/apps.py", line 3, in <module>
    from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
ImportError: cannot import name 'ugettext_lazy' from 'django.utils.translation' (/home/xh/.local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/django/utils/translation/__init__.py)

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System:Ubuntu 22.04
*   Python Version Used:3.10
*  Django Version 4.1.3
*   When you install doccano:2022-12-1
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc):  pip install doccano
